# 🥤 DR.VS Beverages

![DR.VS Beverages](https://img.shields.io/badge/DR.VS-Beverages-brightgreen?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
[![ISO 9001:2015 Certified](https://img.shields.io/badge/ISO%209001:2015-Certified-blue?style=flat-square)](https://www.iso.org/iso-9001-quality-management.html)

> Refreshing & Healthy Drinks for the Modern Consumer

## 🌿 About

DR.VS Beverages is committed to providing refreshing and healthy drink options using natural ingredients with minimal artificial additives. Founded by Dr. Vikesh Kumar in 2025, our company focuses on creating beverages that not only taste great but contribute to your overall wellbeing.

## 🥂 Our Product Line

Our current product lineup includes:

### Zeera Drink
<img src="zeera.jpg" alt="Zeera Drink" width="200">
A flavorful cumin-based drink that aids digestion and provides a natural energy boost.

### Pudina Drink
<img src="pudina.jpg" alt="Pudina Drink" width="200">

A refreshing mint drink perfect for cooling off during hot days and supporting digestive health.

### Lemon Drink
<img src="lemon.jpg" alt="Lemon Drink" width="200">

A tangy lemon-infused drink for instant freshness, packed with vitamin C and antioxidants.

### Tender Coconut Water
<img src="coconut.jpg" alt="Tender Coconut Water" width="200">

Pure and natural coconut water for ultimate hydration and electrolyte replenishment.

## 🏆 Certifications

- **ISO 9001:2015** certified for Manufacturing Trading of Soft Drinks, Production of Mineral Waters And Other Bottled Waters

## 👨‍🔬 Leadership

### Dr. Vikesh Kumar
<img src="ceo.jpg" alt="Dr. Vikesh Kumar" width="150">

**Founder & CEO**

Dr. Vikesh Kumar received his Ph.D. from National Sugar Institute, Kanpur and D.Sc. from the Awadhesh Pratap Singh University, Rewa. With extensive experience in beverage formulation and quality control, Dr. Kumar has dedicated his career to creating healthier alternatives to traditional soft drinks.

## 🔗 Website Features

- Responsive design for optimal viewing on all devices
- Smooth scrolling navigation for easy access to all sections
- Vibrant and engaging product displays
- Clean, modern interface highlighting our commitment to quality
